![](siuba.svg)

Siuba is a library for quick, scrappy data analysis in Python.
It is a port of
[dplyr](https://dplyr.tidyverse.org),
[tidyr](https://tidyr.tidyverse.org),
and other R Tidyverse libraries.

Quickstart | Install siuba and run a basic data analysis.
Key features | Learn about key features and benchmarks.

Programming guide | In-depth guide on programming and extending siuba.
